text: Noémi Ban (; ; ; September 29, 1922 – June 7, 2019) was a Hungarian-born American Jew. She was a survivor of the Holocaust. She was a Golden Apple Award-winning lecturer. She was a known public speaker and teacher in Washington state. Ban was born in Szeged, Kingdom of Hungary. Ban died on June 7, 2019 in Bellingham, Washington at the age of 96.Holocaust survivor Noémi Ban dies at 96 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Holocaust survivors Category:Hungarian people Category:American Jews Category:Educators from Washington (state)
